page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
When we got home we turned on the television to watch the programme 'Wonder Woman'. Then l had a drink of tea and had my dinner which was potatoes,sausagemeat and beans. l finished my tea and cleared the table. At 6.55 we went to see my cousin and Granddad up at Shawswood (the old people's home). Later l arrived back home.I got ready for bed at 9.01. My Mum read me another chapter of the Â£Folk of the Faraway Tree'. After she had finished l turned off the light at 9.15 and went to bed.
By Alexandra Jarvis. Wainscott Junior School.
